General.Name: TTL Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG
General.Description: TTL Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG, an investment company, operates in the commercial real estate market. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Munich, Germany. TTL Beteiligungs- und Grundbesitz-AG is a subsidiary of AR Holding GmbH.

0.Name: Mr. Theo E. Reichert
0.Title: CEO & Chairman of the Exec. Board
